sense.def:
Kadar sta dve stvari
the same
ali kadar je ena stvar
the same as another
, sta dve stvari v nečem popolnoma enaki.

seg.quote: They both wore the same overcoats.
He did exactly the same as John did.

sense.def:
Kadar imata dve stvari neko lastnost, ki je
the same
, jo imata obe.

seg.quote: He and Tom were exactly the same age.
It was the same colour as the wall.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
same
pokažemo, da govorimo samo o eni stvari in ne o dveh različnih.

seg.quote: We come from the same place.
It was possible to work while watching TV at the same time.

sense.def:
Kar je
still the same
, se ni v ničemer spremenilo.

seg.quote: He will never be the same again.
It wouldn't improve me, I'd be the same person I was before I saw it.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
same
tudi pokažemo, da govorimo o tistem, o čemer smo govorili že prej.

seg.quote: For the same reason, the United States lodged a formal protest.
It's the same with teenage fashions.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
all the same
ali
just the same
pokažemo, da se razmere ali naše mnenje o njih ni spremenilo, ne glede na to, kar se je zgodilo ali kar je nekdo rekel.

seg.quote: She knew he wasn't listening, but she went on all the same.
All the same, the courses are very popular.
